LanguageData.ShootingRangeTarget.label: Shooting Target
LanguageData.ShootingRangeTarget.description: The shooting range is a place where you can train your hand-eye coordination.
LanguageData.MartialArtsTarget.label: Martial Arts Target
LanguageData.MartialArtsTarget.description: The martial arts dummy is a place where you can train your martial arts, with or without a weapon.
